member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.BarcodeField
member.summary: A single rectangular region on a form that defines a barcode area on a blank (not filled-in) form. Thus, a barcode reading process can be performed on the filled form during OMR processing.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.BarcodeField.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of BarcodeField with the default parameters.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.BarcodeField.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of the current BarcodeField.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.BarcodeField.Result
member.summary: Gets the results of processing the BarcodeField in the filled-in form.
member.value: A reference of type FieldResult that must be cast to BarcodeFieldResult.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.BarcodeField.Symbology
member.summary: The recognized barcode symbology.
member.value: An enumeration value of type BarcodeSymbology. Default value is Unknown.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.BarcodeFieldResult
member.summary: Provides the results of processing the BarcodeField.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.BarcodeFieldResult.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of BarcodeFieldResult with the default parameters.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.BarcodeFieldResult.BarcodeData
member.summary: A list of BarcodeData objects recognized using LEADTOOLS barcode engine in the filled-in form.
member.value: A list of BarcodeData objects. Default value is **null**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.Field
member.summary: The base class for all OMR fields. Any OMR form field implements this class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.Field.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of Field with the default parameters.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.Field.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of the current Field.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.Field.Bounds
member.summary: The LeadRect area that specifies the location of the field in the OMR image.
member.value: A LeadRect that specifies the location of this field. Default value is empty LeadRect.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.Field.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier for each field in the Fields collection.
member.value: A FieldId object that represents a unique identifier of the Field. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.Field.IsInfoExtracted
member.summary: Indicates whether the Field information has been extracted using ITemplateForm.ExtractInfo.
member.value: **true** if the information has been extracted; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.Field.Name
member.summary: The field's name.
member.value: The string associated with this field.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.Field.PageNumber
member.summary: The page number associated with this field in the Pages object.
member.value: The page number associated with this field.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.Field.Result
member.summary: Gets an object of type FieldResult that contains the processed field results.
member.value: Object of type FieldResult contains the processed field results. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.Field.Tag
member.summary: The user-defined data object that is associated with this object.
member.value: The user-defined data. The default value is **null**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.FieldResult
member.summary: The base class for all [Fields](Fields-Fields.md result classes.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.FieldResult.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of FieldResult with the default parameters.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.FieldResult.Status
member.summary: Indicates the status of processing the Field.
member.value: Enumeration of type FieldStatus representing the status of processing Field. The value can be **Success** if the process succeeded and **Failed** otherwise.

member.summary: The Field collection.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of Fields with the default parameters.

member.summary: Inserts a Field object into this collection.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.GenerateOmrFieldValues
member.summary: A static class used to generate a list of possible values to be used in the OmrField.SetValues method.

member.summary: Generates a list of possible values to be used in OmrField.SetValues method.

The OmrFieldOrientation value of OmrField.

member.summary: The OCR recognized text in the filled-in form.

member.summary: The LeadRect area that specifies the location of the OmrCollection in the OMR image.

member.summary: Confidence value that represents the amount of confidence in the recognition results of the OMR marks.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.ColumnsReportOrder
member.summary: An enumeration that determines the output text reporting order for column wise OmrField.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.ColumnsReportOrder.LeftToRight
member.summary: Report output text from left to right.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.ColumnsReportOrder.RightToLeft
member.summary: Report output text from right to left.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.FieldStatus
member.summary: An enumeration that represents the status of recognizing a Field wether the process was successful.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.FieldStatus.Failed
member.summary: Failed to process the Field object.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.FieldStatus.Success
member.summary: The Field has been processed successfully.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrCollectionStatus
member.summary: An enumeration that indicates the result of processing OmrCollection.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrCollectionStatus.Failed
member.summary: Failed to process this OmrCollection.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrCollectionStatus.Success
member.summary: Processing was succesful.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrCollectionStatus.NoSelection
member.summary: No OmrBubble is filled in this OmrCollection.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrCollectionStatus.MultipleSelections
member.summary: Multiple OmrBubbles are filled.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrFieldBubbleLayoutType
member.summary: Enumeration to determine the type of the associated OmrField object.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrFieldBubbleLayoutType.None
member.summary: Matrix of rows and columns of OMR marks.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrFieldBubbleLayoutType.BubbleWithLabel
member.summary: Every single OMR mark contains a text label.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrFieldOrientation
member.summary: The orientation of the OmrField object.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrFieldOrientation.RowWise
member.summary: Each row of OMR marks has a single output result regardless of multiple or single markings.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrFieldOrientation.ColumnWise
member.summary: Each column of OMR marks has a single output result regardless of multiple or single markings.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrFieldOrientation.FreeFlow
member.summary: All OMR marks in the OmrField are treated as a single row.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrTextFormat
member.summary: Enumeration that represents the output text format of the OmrField.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrTextFormat.CSV
member.summary: Comma Separated Value string format.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrTextFormat.Aggregated
member.summary: Combined output string

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Fields.OmrBubble

member.value: Value between 0 and 100 where 0 is the lowest confidence value and 100 the highest. Default value is 0.

member.value: **true** if the OMR bubble is filled in the OMR image; otherwise, **false**.

member.summary: Gets a LeadRect that specifies the location of the text label next to the OmrBubble that has been recognized with the OCR engine.

member.value: Integer value that represents the score for correct answer for an OmrField. The default value is **1**.

member.summary: The orientation of OmrField.
member.value: A value of type OmrFieldOrientation that determines the field orientation. The default value is RowWise.

member.value: **true** if the associated field is gradable. **false** otherwise.

member.summary: The grade points corresponding to an incorrect answer for an OmrField.

member.summary: The name of the field.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.ObjectiveGrade
member.summary: Specifies the answers and grades for OmrFields objects.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.ObjectiveGrade.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ObjectiveGrade that can be used in grading an OmrField object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.ObjectiveGrade.#ctor(Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrField,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ObjectiveGrade that can be used in grading an OmrFields object.
member.param: OmrFields to be graded using this ObjectiveGrade object.
Sets the ITemplate page number that answerField belongs to.
Sets the grade points corresponding to a correct answer for an OmrCollection in answerField.
Sets the grade points corresponding to an incorrect answer for an OmrCollection in answerField.
Sets the grade points corresponding to no answer/response for an OmrCollection in answerField.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.ObjectiveGrade.AnswersKey
member.summary: Answers key for an OmrField

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrAnalysisEngine
member.summary: Specifies an analysis engine for OMR forms to compute their statistics and grades.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrAnalysisEngine.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of OmrAnalysisEngine to calculate the grade and statistics for OMR based tests and surveys.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrAnalysisEngine.#ctor(Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.IRecognitionForm,Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.IRecognitionForm)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of OmrAnalysisEngine to calculate the grade and statistics for the OMR-based/bubble-based test and survey forms.
member.param: The list of filled forms to be analyzed using this instance of OmrAnalysisEngine.
Form that specifies the answers used in grading the list of forms specified by filledForms . Set to **null** if this is a survey not an exam.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrAnalysisEngine.GetFormFullScore
member.summary: Gets the sum of all graded form fields in all pages.
member.returns: Gets the sum of the graded form fields in all pages.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrAnalysisEngine.GradeForms
member.summary: Performs the grading process of forms.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrAnalysisEngine.DecimalPlace
member.summary: The number of digits to the right of the decimal point to be retained.
member.value: This value should be greater than or equal to 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrAnalysisEngine.FilledForms
member.summary: A list of filled IRecognitionForm forms to be analyzed by OmrAnalysisEngine.
member.value: A List<IRecognitionForm> object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrAnalysisEngine.Grades
member.summary: A list of BaseGrade objects that associate fields with their grading process.
member.value: AList<BaseGrade> object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrAnalysisEngine.PassingScore
member.summary: The minimum passing score for a graded OMR/bubble sheet exam.
member.value: Specifies the minimum score/grade used to determine whether a student passed the exam.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrAnalysisEngine.QuestionsAnswers
member.summary: A Dictionary<string, QuestionAnswers> that associates fields with their answers.
member.value: Dictionary<string, QuestionAnswers> object

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.Engines
member.summary: A class that holds the engines needed for the OmrEngine to process the fields, such as the OCR engine and the barcode engine.

member.summary: The initialized barcode engine object to be used to recognize barcode data.
member.value: An initialized object of type BarcodeEngine. The default value is **null**.

member.summary: The initialized OCR engine object to be used to recognize OCR text.

member.summary: The initialized RasterCodecs object to be used to save and load images of different formats.
member.value: An initialized object of type RasterCodecs. The default value is **null**.

member.summary: Loads the images of the pages from the provided stream.

member.summary: Performs processing on the IRecognitionForm on the page number and fields provided as parameters.
member.param: Integer that represents the page number in the recognition form's Pages collection.
The template form object.
Integer that represents the page number in the template form Pages collection.
A generic collection of Field to be processed in this IRecognitionForm.

member.summary: Performs processing on IRecognitionForm for all pages of the filled-in form and fields existing in the provided ITemplateForm.
member.param: The template form object.

member.summary: The grade of the IRecognitioForm object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.IRecognitionForm.SaveEmbeddedImage
member.summary: Indicates whether to save the RasterImage objects in this form embedded in the binary data saved to the stream using IForm.Save.
member.value: **true** to save the RasterImage objects embedded in the binary data; otherwise, **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.summary: The total score of points for the filled OMR bubbles computed using the OmrAnalysisEngine.
member.value: A double value representing the score of this form. Default value is **0**.

member.summary: Represents a template form in the LEADTOOLS OMR toolkit. The interface provides methods for reading and writing template form recognition attributes, processing fields, and images.

member.summary: Facilitates extracting a collection of fields internal data from the template image.

The fields collection to extract the information.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.ITemplateForm.AutoEstimateMissingOmr
member.summary: The auto estimate OMR bubbles in this ITemplateForm.
member.value: **true** to enable OMR bubbles estimation; otherwise, **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.ITemplateForm.IdentifierFieldId
member.summary: The FieldId object used as the identifier field Id.
member.value: An object of type FieldId associated with this template. The default value is **null**.

member.summary: A struct that holds a histogram data that represents the grades of all IRecognitionForm.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrGradesHistogram.Data
member.summary: Gets the array that represents the histogram of all graded IRecognitionForm forms.
member.value: An array of integers containing the frequency of each grade for all graded IRecognitionForm forms.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrGradesStatistics
member.summary: A struct that contains all statistical data computed after grading the filled forms using the GradeForms method.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrGradesStatistics.GradesHistogram
member.summary: Gets the histogram object that represents the frequency of forms grades.
member.value: A struct of type OmrGradesHistogram. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrGradesStatistics.HighestGrade
member.summary: Double value that represents the highest grade for all graded filled OMR forms.
member.value: Double value between 0 and 100. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrGradesStatistics.LowestGrade
member.summary: Double value that represents the lowest grade for all graded filled OMR forms.
member.value: Double value between 0 and 100. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrGradesStatistics.Mean
member.summary: Double value that represents the mean value for all graded filled OMR forms.
member.value: Double value between 0 and 100. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrGradesStatistics.Median
member.summary: Double value that represents the median value of all graded filled OMR forms.
member.value: Double value between 0 and 100. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrGradesStatistics.NumberFail
member.summary: Represents the number of filled forms with grade value lower than the passing grade specified in PassingScore.
member.value: Integer value representing the count of filled forms with grade value lower than the passing grade. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrGradesStatistics.NumberPass
member.summary: Represents the number of filled forms with grade value higher or equal to the passing grade specified in PassingScore.
member.value: Integer value representing the count of filled forms with grade value higher or equal to the passing grade. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrGradesStatistics.StandardDeviation
member.summary: Double value that represents the standard deviation value of all graded filled OMR forms.
member.value: A double number expressing the quantity of how much deviation exists from the mean value for the group. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.OmrGradesStatistics.TotalForms
member.summary: Total number of filled forms that have been graded using the GradeForms.
member.value: Integer value represents the total number of filled forms graded. The default value is 0.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.QuestionAnswers
member.summary: A structure representing each question answer in the provided answer key, alongside a dictionary that contains the frequency of each answer in the graded filled forms.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.QuestionAnswers.Answer
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the answer for the associated question in the provided OMR form's answer key (IRecognitionForm).
member.value: A string value representing the answer in the OMR form's answer key. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.QuestionAnswers.AnswersCount
member.summary: Gets a dictionary object containing the frequency of the associated question-answers in the graded, filled forms after invoking the OmrAnalysisEngine.GradeForms method.
member.value: A dictionary object containing the frequency of each answer. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Processing.Omr.QuestionAnswers.Name
member.summary: Gets a unique string representing the question in the OMR form.
member.value: String value representing the unique name for the question. The default value is **null**.
